data.title: Primary building selector is nearly invisible against an arctic map
data.body: The word "primary" is drawn in white on the white terrain and consequently is almost invisible.

data.title: Allow empty harvesters to be ordered to refineries
data.body:
The primary reason is to fix OpenRA/ra2#161. Rather than make the
harvester trait more complicated by making this behaviour configurable,
this commit just applies to all harvesters.

The primary impact on gameplay is, I believe, that ordering a harvester out of a combat zone now has another option that requires a little bit less micro since the harvester will go back to harvesting once it's gone back. The behaviour here matches that of the original RA2: the harvester will dock and unload even though it is empty.

data.title: Added uncloaking on docking.
data.body: Closes https://github.com/OpenRA/OpenRA/issues/10991.

data.title: Add support for mod defined package loaders.
data.body:
An `IPackageLoader` interface should be defined, much like the existing sprite and sound loaders.
The `IReadOnlyPackage` implementations will also need to grow automatic format detection.

The hardcoded package types can then be removed from `FileSystem.OpenPackage` and related code.

data.title: Allow Dedicated Servers to query map info from the Resource Center.
data.body:
Dedicated servers will now query the map API in the same way that clients do.
This removes the need to manually rsync maps.

Closes #3558.
Closes #10690.
Closes #10717.

data.title: Cannot add uncloaking of harvesters in mod when docking
data.body:
I am making a C&C3-like mod for TD and I have made steath harvesters for Nod. They must uncloak when they are docking to a refinery but there isn't a property for that in `Cloak` trait.
![screenshot_2016-03-28_16-53-31](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/10116666/14079353/ad82e86e-f505-11e5-9033-46e17feb9813.png)

data.title: Allow attaching sounds to explosion animations instead of warhead
data.body:
Rather than using ImpactSounds on a warhead, the sound would be attached to the animation itself. This allows you to have multiple different explosions that each have their own individual list of unique sounds, and also removes the need for repeating the same warhead code multiple times.

See TS/RA2/YR for implementation.

data.title: Fixed Could not find collection '' spam in debug.log
data.body: Saw it a lot in the d2k mod. I guess bailing out earlier wins some performance.

data.title: Support custom SupportDir overrides.
data.body: This adds support for a `SupportDir=FooBar` commandline argument to force a specified support directory.  The main motivation is to simplify testing changes relating to map installation on dedicated servers, but this could also be used by mods that want to manage a self-contained engine distribution that is automatically versioned and upgraded.

data.title: Add ScriptTags trait
data.body:
This allows actors to be tagged with arbitrary strings.
Also includes `ScriptTagsInit` and `MapGlobal.ActorsWithTag`
  which expose this functionality to map scripters.

I am using this like such:

``` lua
_paradrop_wps = {
    ['a'] = Map.ActorsWithTag('paradrop_a'),
    ['b'] = Map.ActorsWithTag('paradrop_b'),
    ['c'] = Map.ActorsWithTag('paradrop_c'),
    ['d'] = Map.ActorsWithTag('paradrop_d')
}

...

SetupStartingForces = function(player)
    local spawn2alpha = { 'a', 'b', 'c', 'd' }
    for _, actor in ipairs(Map.NamedActors) do
        local tag = 'owner_' .. spawn2alpha[player.Spawn]
        if actor.HasTag(tag) then
            actor.Owner = player
        end
    end
end
```

ref #10956

data.title: Ingame IRC join crash
data.body:
Just happened, no idea why. Did not happen during subsequent tries.

```
Red Alert Mod at Version release-20151224
on map f952d7560302bcb9b5363ce65a66ebaf2a1590d7 (Desert Shellmap by Scott_NZ).
Operating System: Windows (Microsoft Windows NT 6.2.9200.0)
Runtime Version: .NET CLR 4.0.30319.42000
Exception of type `System.NullReferenceException`: De objectverwijzing is niet op een exemplaar van een object ingesteld.
   bij OpenRA.Chat.GlobalChat.OnJoin(Object sender, JoinEventArgs e)
   bij Meebey.SmartIrc4net.IrcClient._Event_JOIN(IrcMessageData ircdata)
   bij Meebey.SmartIrc4net.IrcClient._HandleEvents(IrcMessageData ircdata)
   bij Meebey.SmartIrc4net.IrcClient._Worker(Object sender, ReadLineEventArgs e)
   bij Meebey.SmartIrc4net.ReadLineEventHandler.Invoke(Object sender, ReadLineEventArgs e)
   bij Meebey.SmartIrc4net.IrcConnection.ReadLine(Boolean blocking)
   bij Meebey.SmartIrc4net.IrcConnection.Listen(Boolean blocking)
   bij OpenRA.Chat.GlobalChat.<Connect>m__8()
   bij System.Threading.ThreadHelper.ThreadStart_Context(Object state)
   bij System.Threading.ExecutionContext.RunInternal(ExecutionContext executionContext, ContextCallback callback, Object state, Boolean preserveSyncCtx)
   bij System.Threading.ExecutionContext.Run(ExecutionContext executionContext, ContextCallback callback, Object state, Boolean preserveSyncCtx)
   bij System.Threading.ExecutionContext.Run(ExecutionContext executionContext, ContextCallback callback, Object state)
   bij System.Threading.ThreadHelper.ThreadStart()
```
